snippet.title: Update on Swine Influenza
snippet.description: * Update on Swine Influenza or World Health Organization (WHO) authorities. President Felipe Calderón published an order today that would give his government powers to address a deadly flu epidemic, including isolation of persons affected by the rare virus, inspection of their homes,...

snippet.title: The FDA Approves New Treatment of Allergic Rhinitis
snippet.description: * The FDA Approves New Treatment of Allergic Rhinitis Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd. recently announced the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approval of their new “dry” nasal aerosol, QNASLTM. The corticosteroid spray is intended to treat year-round and seasonal allergic rhinitis in individu...
